click on cellphone[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //body[1]/div[6]/div[2]/ul[1]/li[2]/ul[1]/li[2]/a[1]] Verify cellphone text[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //div[@class='page-title']/h1[text() = 'Cell phones']] click on list[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //div/a[text()='List']] click on nokia[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //h2/a[text()='Nokia Lumia 1020']] Verify Nokia Lumia Text: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //h1[contains(text(),'Nokia Lumia 1020')]] Verify the price [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //span[@id='price-value-20']] Update the product quantity [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> css selector: #product_enteredQuantity_20] Click on Nokia to cart [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> css selector: #add-to-cart-button-20] Verify the text product to the cart [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //body/div[@id='bar-notification']/div[1]/p[1]] Click on cross button to cancel [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //body/div[@id='bar-notification']/div[1]/span[1]] Mouse Hover to shopping cart [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //span[contains(text(),'Shopping cart')]] Click on cart button [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //button[contains(text(),'Go to cart')]] Verify shopping cart text: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //div[@class='page-title']/h1[contains(text(),'Shopping cart')]] Verify the product quantity[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //td[@class='quantity']/child::input] Verify the total price: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //tbody/tr[1]/td[6]/span[1]] Click on term of services: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> id: termsofservice] Click on checkout button [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //button[@id='checkout']] Verify welcome text[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //h1[text()='Welcome, Please Sign In!']] click on register tab[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //button[contains(text(),'Register')]] Verify register text: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //h1[contains(text(),'Register')]] Enter the first name to field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> id: FirstName] Enter the last name to field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> id: LastName] Enter the email to email field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> id: ConfirmPassword] Click in register button [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> id: register-button] Verify the registration [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //div[contains(text(),'Your registration completed')]] Click on continue button [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (6183c5ffc29074ce2d12690378bcc539)] -> xpath: //a[contains(text(),'Continue')]] Verify shopping cart text: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS
